title: Ban
body: Just received a nice permaban. Didn't receive any emails from riot and still haven't. Just got off a 25 game chat restriction so why no 14 day ban instead? I know I was toxic but I shoulda gotten a 14 day ban instead.

replies.body:
You can skip punishment levels if you're deemed toxic enough (though, only in severe cases), perhaps it's simply that you were too toxic to be given the extra chance that a 14-day ban would have given you.

If you want more info on why (or want to appeal, but don't get your hopes up) then you'd need to contact [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). They should be able to tell you why you've skipped the 14-day ban.

As mentioned by HeartVine - Punishment levels can be skipped if the toxicity was bad enough.

It's unfortunate, but the system is in place for a reason, and I completely support it.

It is within the Summoners Code, that we all agreed to upon opening an account with Riot. 

Good Luck on your endeavours.
